DescriptionThe Technology Center for Genomics & Bioinformatics (TCGB) is seeking to hire a Lab Supervisor to lead their Single Cell Sequencing section. Primary duties include:Oversee technical and research developmentDirectly supervise a team of researchers and lab personnelCollaborate with the Core Director to develop and implement new protocols and applications in Single Cell Sequencing (e.g. 10x single cell sample preparation, library construction, NGS, data analysis)Assist with the implementation of new assay/sequencing platforms and other laboratory development projectsLead new research initiatives and projects within the Core Salary range: $55600.00-$110600.00 Annual
